metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12470 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Wikimedia MediaWiki through 1.32.1 has Incorrect Access Control. Suppressed log in RevisionDelete page is exposed. Fixed in 1.32.2, 1.31.2, 1.30.2 and 1.27.6.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-12470` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.31.2-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.31.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.31.2-1').
